titleStmt.title: An apolagy of the Holy Sea apostolicks proceeding for the gouernment of the Catholics of England during the tyme of persecution VVith a defense of a religious state, vvritten by Daniel of Iesus reader of Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Floyd, John, 1572-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
